name: ABSTRACT DASHER
description:
There's no time to waste!

You gotta go! Use those (non-existent) legs to book it! Go through the weird magical loops - they speed you up! Why must you speed up? Well, don't look back (you can't anyway) but something's chasing you!

Controls KeysDescriptionLeft and Right Arrow keys
Steer Left and Right
Space bar
Boost (can only use once per run!)
Additional Fluff

This game was made for the Juice Jam, a game jam all about exploring that game juice!

This game would not be possible without the help of ThronoChrigger for his amazing music!

And hey, if you love my stuff, check me out on my Twitter!

Additional sounds from www.zapsplat.com too!
